entry.title: BIP clearing house addresses
entry.summary: Based on the context provided, it is suggested that holding people's funds may not be necessary to provide certain features. While a millisecond latency may be important for some traders, 99 out of 100 would be willing to accept a 100 millisecond delay if it meant there was no counterparty risk involved. It is unclear what specific features or platform this conversation is referring to.
